attributes.action: Order the TV licence fee to be scrapped Because
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Unfair to other TV company to feather mainly BBC
2. It is a tax on people many of whom can ill afford it
3. BBC is not representative of the people who have to fund it
4. It is a wasteful organisation by all accounts
5. It is not truly accountable 
6. It has become a nepotistic organistion promoting vested interests of friends and relatives and
7. Order the closure of BBC and sell it off.

rejection.details: Please sign one of the other tv licence petitions
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
